title: Daily's Premium Meats, LLC Recalls Bacon Products Due to Possible Listeria Adulteration
summary: WASHINGTON, Oct. 3, 2016 Dailys Premium Meats, LLC, a Salt Lake City, Utah establishment, is recalling approximately 170 pounds of ready-to-eat bacon products that may be adulterated with Listeria monocytogenes, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today.The Regular Ends...
